sections.summary: i am a human resources & business administrator with over 10 years of progressive experience; augmented by a strong post-graduate background in human resources, conflict resolution, and international relations. i have experience in hr policy and organizational design, job analysis, employee management, recruitment/selection process, benefits/compensation, contract negotiations, performance management, training/development, and strategic planning. i have a sound knowledge of labor relations, occupational health & safety, pay equity and other related labor laws locally and internationally. i've proven ability to implement successful human resources management strategies to support corporate mandate. functional expertise strategic planning learning & development policies & procedures performance reviews recruitment/selection process employee welfare talent management organization leadership risk management
